comprehensive_overview: bcl2fastq is a software tool developed by Illumina that converts base call files (BCL) generated by Illumina sequencers into FASTQ files, which are commonly used for downstream sequence data analysis.
core_features: Some core features of bcl2fastq include demultiplexing of sequencing data, barcode processing, quality score calculation, adapter trimming, and outputting high-quality FASTQ files ready for further analysis.
